overview:
Jasir Javaz, a native of Kerala, India, is a Professional Blogger and Entrepreneur. He did his B tech from AWH Engineering college, Calicut. He honored a Bsc Mathematics degree also from University of Calicut. At AWH he met Mr. Nipun Balan, now working as a Software Engineer in Trasset India. He gave him the knowledge about Web, Computer etc. Then he started browsing. Through Google, from there he met so many new things in the Internet world.

He started studying about Web designing. He launched his first website www.jasi.co.nr , with using Dream weaver, www.110mb.com , .co.nr etc.. After getting a good knowledge in web designing he started to learn about web developing. For that he just googled 2 languages, ASP.net and php .

He reached a conclusion that php is the best language ever. Then he joined for php course in aquetrans Calicut. From there he met Mr. Muneef Hameed, the tech Guru. By doing the course and after by working there Jasir Javaz learn more about php, Ajax, Javascript and Wordpress, Joomla and Drupal like CMSs.

By getting a well knowledge in Wordpress he started his first professional website www.eNewsLatest.com . after 6 months he decided to change the domain name in to small domain. he get the new domain www.eNewsz.com .

Now he working as the CEO of www.eNewsz.com . eNewsz is the The hottest Twitter, Facebook, Google, SEO, Mozilla, CMS, Hosting, Blogging review site.
